metadata.title: CVE-2019-12922 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A CSRF issue in phpMyAdmin 4.9.0.1 allows deletion of any server in the Setup page. It was discovered that phpmyadmin incorrectly handled some requests. An attacker could possibly use this to perform a CSRF attack.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1').
